row.process:
!:PSET &GLOBAL_HOSTNAME#=WIN :DEFINE &MY_RC#,string :SET &MAX_ITERATIONS#=GET_VAR(VARA.TECHNICAL.TIMER_RETRY,'TASK_IVANTI','1') :SET &TEMPORISATION#=GET_VAR(VARA.TECHNICAL.TIMER_RETRY,'TASK_IVANTI','2') :SET &MY_USER#=GET_VAR(VARA.TECHNICAL.IVANTI,'SOAP_USER','1') :SET &MY_PASSWORD#=GET_VAR(VARA.TECHNICAL.IVANTI,'SOAP_PASSWORD','1') :SET &MY_IVANTI_SERVER#=GET_VAR(VARA.TECHNICAL.IVANTI,'IVANTI_SERVER','1') :SET &MY_SOAP_LINK#=GET_VAR(VARA.TECHNICAL.IVANTI,'SOAP_LINK','1') :REGISTER_VARIABLE "MY_RC#","KO" :BEGIN_EXT_INT POWERSHELL write-host "* * * * * * * * * *" get-executionpolicy write-host "* * * * * * * * * *" $i=1 $max=&MAX_ITERATIONS# $tempo=&TEMPORISATION#
$secpasswd = ConvertTo-SecureString "&MY_PASSWORD#" -AsPlainText -Force $mycreds = New-Object System.Management.Automation.PSCredential ("&MY_USER#", $secpasswd) $myWS = New-WebServiceProxy -uri &MY_SOAP_LINK# -Credential $mycreds while ($i -le $max){ $my_status=$myWS.GetTaskStatus(3)
write-host "DEBUG status " + $my_status.status if ($my_status.status -eq "Fail") { write-Host "IVANTI: &GLOBAL_HOSTNAME# &ITEM# KO" :REGISTER_VARIABLE "MY_RC#","KO" break } elseif ($my_status.status -eq "Success") { write-Host "IVANTI: &GLOBAL_HOSTNAME# &ITEM# OK" :REGISTER_VARIABLE "MY_RC#","OK" break } else { Write-Host "i: " + $i + " max": + $max + " tempo: " + $tempo Start-Sleep -s $tempo $i++ } } if ($i -gt $max) { Write-Host "TIMEOUT i: " + $i + " max": + $max + " tempo: " + $tempo :REGISTER_VARIABLE "MY_RC#","TIMEOUT" } :END_EXT_INT POWERSHELL

row.post_process: :IF &MY_RC# = "KO" : PRINT KO: IVANTI &GLOBAL_HOSTNAME# &ITEM# : PRINT DEBUG &EXIT_KISS_KO# : PSET &EXIT_KISS_KO#="&EXIT_KISS_KO#,IVANTI &GLOBAL_HOSTNAME# &ITEM#" : MODIFY_STATE STATUS_TEXT="IVANTI &GLOBAL_HOSTNAME# &ITEM#" : MODIFY_STATE RETCODE=10 :ENDIF :IF &MY_RC# = "OK" : PRINT OK: IVANTI &GLOBAL_HOSTNAME# &ITEM# : PRINT DEBUG &EXIT_KISS_OK# : PSET &EXIT_KISS_OK#="&EXIT_KISS_OK#,IVANTI &GLOBAL_HOSTNAME# &ITEM#" : MODIFY_STATE STATUS_TEXT="IVANTI &GLOBAL_HOSTNAME# &ITEM#" : MODIFY_STATE RETCODE=0 :ENDIF :IF &MY_RC# = "TIMEOUT" : PRINT TIMEOUT: IVANTI &GLOBAL_HOSTNAME# &ITEM# : PRINT DEBUG &EXIT_KISS_KO# : PSET &EXIT_KISS_KO#="&EXIT_KISS_KO#,TIMEOUT IVANTI &GLOBAL_HOSTNAME# &ITEM#" : MODIFY_STATE STATUS_TEXT="IVANTI &GLOBAL_HOSTNAME# &ITEM#" : MODIFY_STATE RETCODE=2Ã :ENDIF
